body_html:
Unfortunately this doesn't seem the case on Windows (x64):

$ pip show protobuf
Name: protobuf
Version: 3.5.1
Summary: Protocol Buffers
Home-page: https://developers.google.com/protocol-buffers/
Author: protobuf@googlegroups.com
Author-email: protobuf@googlegroups.com
License: 3-Clause BSD License
Location: c:\users\patrik\appdata\local\programs\python\python36\lib\site-packages
Requires: six, setuptools

$ python -c "from google.protobuf.internal import api_implementation; print(api_implementation._default_implementation_type)"
python

body:
Unfortunately this doesn't seem the case on Windows (x64):
```
$ pip show protobuf
Name: protobuf
Version: 3.5.1
Summary: Protocol Buffers
Home-page: https://developers.google.com/protocol-buffers/
Author: protobuf@googlegroups.com
Author-email: protobuf@googlegroups.com
License: 3-Clause BSD License
Location: c:\users\patrik\appdata\local\programs\python\python36\lib\site-packages
Requires: six, setuptools

$ python -c "from google.protobuf.internal import api_implementation; print(api_implementation._default_implementation_type)"
python
```
